skin.boonie.farmerhat.desc: Κάτι για να κρύβει τον ήλιο από τα μάτια σας ενώ φροντίζετε τις καλλιέργειές σας.
skin.boots.bloodyboots.desc: Αυτές είναι η μπότες αφού φάγατε τον εχθρό σας
skin.boots.scavengedsneakers.desc: Τα πάνινα παπούτσια κάποτε ήταν στυλάτα, τώρα είναι ιδρωμένα, βρώμικα και εκτός στυλ.
skin.buckethat.medichelmet.desc:
Article 24: Medical personnel exclusively engaged in the search for, or the collection, transport or treatment of the wounded or sick?shall be respected and protected in all circumstances.

--Geneva Conventions, 1949
skin.burlapgloves.boxer'sbandages.desc: Simple and stained bandage hand wraps.
skin.burlapshirt.piratevest&shirt.desc: Vest & Shirt found in old sunken ship
skin.cap.friendlycap.desc: Γνωστοποιήστε σε όλους ότι είστε φιλικός!
skin.cap.rescuecap.desc: Γνωστοποιήστε σε όλους ότι σώζετε ζωές
skin.hoodie.bloodyhoodie.desc: Αυτό είναι το φούτερ σας αφού φάγατε τον εχθρό σας
skin.hoodie.cuda87hoodie.desc: Hoodie σχεδιασμένο για τον twitch streamer Cuda87
skin.hoodie.rhinocrunchhoodie.desc: A green digital camo print hoodie for the end game Rust players who want that extra visual advantage in the Forrest biome.
skin.hoodie.safetycrew.desc:
Workplace accidents are no joke, countless Newmans have lost their lives on the job. Their screams are heard on construction sites big and small. 

Whether you're walling off a rad town or turning that 2x2 house into a 2x2 home this hoodie is says 'Safey First.'
skin.hoodie.skeletonhoodie.desc: Κουδουνίστρα με κόκαλα! Είναι ένα φούτερ!
skin.longtshirt.azteclongt-shirt.desc: From the lake of Texcoco and the hand of an handicraftman of Tenochtitlan. Here it's... the Aztec Long T-Shirt
skin.longtshirt.creepyjack.desc: A limited edition Halloween 2015 long sleeved tshirt
skin.longtshirt.greencheckeredshirt.desc: Ένα πράσινο καρό μπλουζάκι για τον ήρωα εκεί έξω.
skin.longtshirt.merryreindeer.desc: Christmas is the time for candies and miracles. This Merry Reindeer Long T-shirt will bring you Christmas luck and make your harsh survival in Rust sweet and fun!
Μπορεί να μοιάζετε με αλήτη αλλά ξέρετε ότι πρόκειται για ένα έργο τέχνης.
skin.pipeshotgun.thepeacepipe.desc: Smoke your enemies with the Peace Pipe!
skin.pumpshotgun.pumpshotgunchieftain.de:
The first ever Rust workshop collaboration! Workshoppers Abracadaniel & Baka has made this gorgeous Chieftain frontier shotgun that will guarantee you the tribe leader role. 

Be awesome and vote yes + favorite if you like this skin, you have our thanks
skin.pumpshotgun.theswampmaster.desc: Now with this gator skin clad shotgun you can say "Get out of my swamp" and mean it!
skin.revolver.revolveroutback.desc: A revolver with a forest/jungle camouflage pattern
skin.semiautopistol.halloweenbat.desc: A limited editing Halloween 2015 bat themed pistol skin
skin.sleepingbag.astonchristmas.desc: A cartoony Christmas themed sleeping bag
skin.sleepingbag.horrorbag.desc: A limited edition Halloween 2015 pumpkin and bat themed sleeping bag
skin.sleepingbag.tigercrownsleepingbag.d: A sleeping bag made out of tiger fur
skin.sleepingbag.woodcamosleepingbag.des: USA Wood Camo Sleeping Bag, great for hiding!
skin.tshirt.argylescavenger.desc: Bring out your inner father figure with this fashionably dirty sweater.
skin.tshirt.baseballtshirt.desc: A very popular game back before people were trying to kill each other.
skin.tshirt.blackskull&bonestshirt.desc: Representing a certain feeling of hopelssness and doom
skin.tshirt.missingtexturesfull.desc: The textures were never found for this shirt. We have to inform the Devs somehow!
skin.tshirt.murderertshirt.desc: Graphic Tee that says murderer in japanese.
skin.tshirt.serwintertshirt.desc: The official Tshirt for Ser Winter
skin.tshirt.smilet-shirt.desc: Encourage other players to give you a smile
skin.tshirt.targetpracticetshirt.desc: Used by cocky players or by friends for target practice.
skin.tshirt.vyshyvanka.desc: Ukrainian traditional shirt with some traces of agricultural activities.
skin.woodstorage.firstaidgreen.desc: Ξύλινο κουτί - Πρώτες βοήθειες - Πράσινη έκδοση
skull.fire.pit.desc: An evil take on the campfire, this deployable has all the same features with the added bonus of being creepy as hell.
skull.trophy.desc: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.
skull_fire_pit.desc: Enjoy burning your enemies remnants to ashes with this Halloween exclusive! Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.
skulldoorknocker.name: Skull Door Knocker
skullspike_desc: Skulls on a Spike. Comes with 3 variants including a candlelit version.
skullspikes.desc: A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.
skullspikes.name: Skull Spikes
skulltrophy_desc: Display your victims names by inserting their skulls into the trophy. Comes with 4 variations.
sled.desc: A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.
sleepingbag.desc: A sleeping bag. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.
sleepingscreen.title: YOU'RE SLEEPING
slots_multiplier: Increase the multiplier to access bigger jackpots with higher buy-ins!
slots_panel_description: Deposit scrap into the machine and pull the handle. If the reels land on a winning pattern, you'll win the payout!
small.oil.refinery.desc: Ένα μικρό διυλιστήριο το οποίο μπορεί να παράγει χαμηλής ποιότητας καύσιμο από το αργό πετρέλαιο.
smallfireworks.desc: A package of smaller style fireworks. Included is roman candles in 4 colors, and 3 colors of a volcano style firework
smallshark.desc: A small, surprisingly aggressive deep sea predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.
smallwaterbottle.desc: A Small Water Bottle. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out.
smart.alarm.desc: Sends a notifications to your phone when powered on.
smg.2.desc: Ένα γρήγορο αυτόματο όπλο. θυσιάζει ακρίβεια και απόσταση για την ταχύτητα.
smgbody.desc: The firing mechanism of a submachinegun. Used in construction of a weapon that can fire pistol ammo fully automatic.
smgbody.name: Σώμα SMG
snowballgun.desc: Load snowballs and lay waste to your foes with Christmas cheer.
snowmachine.desc: A machine which will blanket the surrounding terrain in snow.
snowman.desc: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative snowman
snowman.name: Χιονάνθρωπος
socketsdesc: One "socket" is one connection point on a modular vehicle
sofa.desc: A comfortable old sofa. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.
softcore.reclaim: You can reclaim some of your lost items by visiting the Outpost or Bandit Town.
softcore.reclaimdespawn: Items remaining in the reclaim terminal will despawn in two hours.
solarpanel.large.desc: A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.
sound.laser.desc: A small device that shoots out visible lasers in time to music.
sound.light.desc: A light that will pulse in time to music when connected to a Boom Box.
spacesuit.desc: A space suit built for harsh conditions.
sparkplug1.desc: Low quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
sparkplug1.name: Low Quality Spark Plugs
sparkplug2.desc: Medium quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
sparkplug2.name: Medium Quality Spark Plugs
sparkplug3.desc: High quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
sparkplug3.name: High Quality Spark Plugs
spear.stone.desc: A stone-tipped wooden Spear. Slightly longer range.
spear.wooden.desc: Primitive weapon, perfect for hunting your foes. Can be upgraded to Stone Spear.
speargun.desc: A speargun which can be fired underwater
spiderweb.desc: Giant Cobwebs which can be hung against both a ceiling and a wall.
spiderweb.name: Spider Webs
spikes.floor.desc: Μια σειρά από καρφιά που θα βλάψει και επιβραδύνει όποιος πατήσει πάνω τους.
splitter.desc: Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.
spookyspeaker.desc: Frighten your guests with creepy and spooky halloween sounds!
spreaddesc: How far off from the fired trajectory the projectile may deviate
stables_buysaddle: Sure, Just purchase a saddle and head over to the stables and claim the steed of your liking! Don't forget to examine the horse before you decide to make sure you like him!
stables_buysaddle_ok: Okay, Let me see what you've got!
stables_intro_seewares: What do you have for sale?
stables_intro_wanthorse: I'd like to buy a horse
stablesintro: Howdy Partner! What can I help you with today?
stairs_desc: Stairs that go up in spiral over half block height
stairs_lshape_desc: Stairs that are an L shape
stash.small.desc: Ένα κρυφό, θαμμένο τσαντάκι που θα κρατήσει τα αντικείμενα σας ασφαλή. Μετά την τοποθέτηση, επιστρέψτε και σημαδέψτε στο σημείο που το κρύψατε και θα αποκαλυφθεί.
steaminventory.bag.high.desc: Bags contain clothes. This is a high quality bag, which means the clothes in this bag are higher quality than in the low quality bag.
steaminventory.bag.low.desc: Bags contain clothes. This is a low quality bag - which means the skins contained within are worth less than in other bags.
steaminventory.barrel.desc: Barrels contain skins for weapons and tools. Anything that the player holds.
steaminventory.box.high.desc: Boxes contain deployables, such as sleeping bags and crates.
steaminventory.cloth.desc: Cloth can be combined to craft new clothing items.
steaminventory.metal.desc: Metal can be combined to craft new weapon items.
This special crate acquired from a twitch drop during Trust in Rust 3 will yield a random skin
steaminventory.wood.desc: Wood can be combined to craft new skins and items
sticks.name: Sticks
stocking.large.desc: A SUPER Stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get an awesome gift!
stocking.large.name: SUPER Stocking
stocking.small.desc: A small stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get a gift! Collect 6 to upgrade to a SUPER Stocking.
stocking.small.name: Small Stocking
stone.pickaxe.desc: Primitive tool used for harvesting Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore.
stonehatchet.desc: Primitive tool used for harvesting wood from trees and logs.
stones.desc: Harvested from rocks using tools, basic building material.
strobelight.desc: A flashing light, 3 speeds. Causes seizures.
submarine.torpedo.rising.desc: A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead while rising to the water's surface.
submarine.torpedo.straight.desc: A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead in a straight line.
sulfur.desc: Sulfur is commonly used in gunpowder, medicine, and matches. Matches release sulfur dioxide when they burn, giving them their smell. Sulfur is an essential component to living cells. Many proteins contain sulfur. It is also used as a pesticide on organic farms.
sulfur.ore.desc: A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.
sunglasses.desc: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
sunglasses.name: Sunglasses
supply.signal.desc: Purple signal smoke. Use to mark a location for an airdrop.
surveycharge.desc: Use this on the terrain to see which resources are available for mining.
switch_on_desc: Άναψε το φακό για να εκπέμπει φως το καπέλο. Το αντικείμενο αυτό καταναλώνει καύσιμο και κάποια στιγμή θα σπάσει.
syringe.medical.desc: Θεραπεύστε τον εαυτό σας ή τους άλλους με αυτήν την σύριγγα. Με αριστερό κλικ θεραπεύστε τον εαυτό σας, με δεξί τους άλλους.
table.desc: Every home needs a table. A decorative item which provides comfort when in close proximity.
tactical.gloves.desc: Military issue tactical gloves provide protection as well as weapon stabilization leading to higher accuracy when used.
target.reactive.desc: A reactive target that knocks down when hit, can be reset.
targeting.computer.desc: Ένας υπολογιστής με λογισμικό που μπορεί να αναλύσει ένα βίντεο και να παράγει τα περιστροφικά δέλτα για τα διάφορα αντικείμενα που περιέχονται σε αυτό.
tarp.name: Αδιάβροχο
teachparts.name: Τεχνολογικά σκουπίδια
team.invited: {0} has invited you to join a team
techparts.desc: Μια συλλογή από διάφορα τεχνολογικά εξαρτήματα.
telephone.desc: Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!
telephone_makecall_desc: Dial a number or a contact
tocraft: You can also press {%inventory.togglecrafting} to switch to crafting
tool.binoculars.desc: Binoculars allowing you to see objects at great length.
tool.binoculars.name: Κυάλια
tool.camera.desc: Μια φωτογραφική μηχανή. Βγάλτε φωτογραφίες με αριστερό κλικ, κάντε ζουμ μέσα και έξω με δεξί κλικ και κλειδώστε την εστίαση με κλίκ ροδέλας.
tool.instant_camera.desc: An instant camera. Take photos with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and change focus mode with reload.
toolgun.desc: Celebrating 15 Years of Garry's Mod! Use this tool gun to upgrade building parts. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.
toolgun.name: Garry's Mod Tool Gun
toolgun.steam.desc: A special gift to owners of Garry's Mod. Celebrating 15 years!
toolgun.steam.name: Garry's Mod Tool Gun
tooltip.af: Makes textures sharper when viewed at an angle or distance. Large performance impact.
tooltip.antialiasing: Smoothes jagged edges of the scene
tooltip.ao: Makes crevices darker, giving the scene more depth
tooltip.bloom: Makes bright lights appear to glow realistically
tooltip.branding: Show or hide the green banner on the top right of your screen
tooltip.compass: Controls visiblity of the ingame compass
tooltip.contactshadows: Adds contact shadows to improve shadow detail on view model, players and any areas that may otherwise be missed by shadow maps.
tooltip.culling: Enables hiding of objects behind walls. Disable if you notice any lag or frame rate drops while rotating the camera.
tooltip.dof: Make stuff in the distance blurry. Looks cool, adds nothing.
tooltip.flipy: Inverts what moving the mouse up and down does
tooltip.gibsmax: Maximum amount of gibs (broken objects) that can exist at one time
tooltip.grassdisplace: Displaces grass when walking over it
tooltip.grassshadows: Enables shadow casting on grass blades.
tooltip.inventory-swap-key: You can also press {%inventory.toggle} to switch to inventory
tooltip.midiinput: Enable to play Instruments with connected MIDI devices.
tooltip.parallax: Gives textures the illusion of depth and geometry. High performance impact.
tooltip.playernames: Show or hide the player names that float above their heads
tooltip.pushtotalk: If disabled your mic will be broadcast all the time, instead of when you press the chat button
tooltip.reflex: Enable NVIDIA Reflex. Dynamically reduces system latency.
tooltip.shadowcascades: Number of distance splits for sun and moon shadows. Fewer cascades mean more performance and lower quality.
tooltip.sustainInput: Enable to allow sustain pedal input from MIDI devices while playing instruments
tooltip.vignet: Darkens the corners of the screen (no performance hit)
toptier_upgrade_desc: Strongest class of material, 4x as strong as stone.
torch.desc: Ένας πυρσός. φωτίστε τον δρόμο σας τη νύχτα και μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως όπλο.
translation_source: Translations are provided by the community so there may be mistakes. If you would like to help us translate please join in at translate.playrust.com
trap.bear.desc: A metal trap that can injure or even kill people when stepped on. Can be picked up after been triggered.
trap.landmine.desc: Μια παλιά στρατιωτική νάρκη. Αν την πατήσετε σταθείτε πάνω της και ζητήστε από έναν φίλο να την αφόπλιση πριν εκραγεί.
treegatherdesc: Speed at gathering Wood, red indicates fraction destroyed.
troutsmall.desc: A Small Trout. Good for a few meals.
tshirt.desc: Ένα μπλουζάκι με πολύ κοντά μανίκια.
tshirt.flag.germany.desc: Καμιά φορά αισθάνεστε λίγο Γερμανός και θέλετε να το ξέρουν οι πάντες
tshirt.flag.russia.desc: Το να μιλάτε Ρώσικα στο chat και το να φτιάχνετε Ρώσικες σημαίες δεν είναι αρκετό. Φροντίστε ότι όλοι γνωρίζουν πως είστε από τη Ρωσία φορώντας αυτό το μπλουζάκι.
tshirt.long.black.desc: Δημοφιλής ανάμεσα σε διαρρήκτες, γαλλικά μίμους και γκοθάδες - αυτή η μακρυμάνικη μπλούζα διαθέτει μια εκπληκτική έλλειψη χρώματος.
tshirt.long.grey.desc: Συμφιλιωθείτε με την αίσθηση του ότι η ζωή σας είναι σχετικά ασήμαντη με αυτήν την γκρι μακρυμάνικη μπλούζα.
tshirt.long.orange.desc: This is like a normal tshirt, but it has sleeves that extend to your wrists.
tshirt.long.yellow.desc: Like being noticed immediately from 200 feet away? Give this yellow long sleeved tshirt a try!
tshirt_black_desc: A black tshirt. It's slightly worn, slightly sweaty, slightly smelly.
tshirt_blue_desc: A blue tshirt. It's slightly worn, slightly sweaty, slightly smelly.
tshirt_forestcamo_desc: Perfect for when you're hiding in a forest but want to look cool when you get caught
tshirt_red_desc: A red tshirt. It's slightly worn, slightly sweaty, slightly smelly.
tshirt_urbancamo_desc: In a city? Want people to think your torso is invisible? This is the shirt for you!
turn_off_desc: Turn off the hat. Stop emitting light and stop using fuel.
turret_attackall_desc: Target everyone who is not authorized
turret_peacekeeper_desc: Ενεργοποίηση λειτουργίας ειρηνευτή και στοχεύση μόνο οπλισμένον ή εχθρικόν παικτών
twitchsunglasses.desc: Sunglasses - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.
twitchsunglasses.name: Purple Sunglasses
twitchunderwear.name: Purple Underwear
unlock_spinning_desc: Allow Anyone to spin the wheel
unreliabledesc: This explosive device has a chance of failing to detonate. If this happens you may retrieve it and try again.
upgrade_stone_desc: A strong material. Impervious to fire and melee damage.
upkeep_info: Maintain the required amount of resources to prevent your base from decaying over time. Bases left unattended without enough upkeep resources will be destroyed.
usebench_desc: Open your crafting window and use this bench
uselight_desc: Control the aim direction of the light
valve1.desc: Low quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
valve1.name: Low Quality Valves
valve2.desc: Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
valve2.name: Medium Quality Valves
valve3.desc: High quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
valve3.name: High Quality Valves
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.armored.desc: Single module armored cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.desc: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.with.engine.desc: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger, with a small engine.
vehicle.1mod.passengers.armored.desc: Single module armored seating for two passengers.
vehicle.1mod.rear.seats.desc: Single module seating for two passengers.
vehicle.1mod.taxi.desc: Single module seating for two passengers, with protection at the front.
vehicleediting_badoccupant: The vehicle on the lift is not in an editable state.
vehicleediting_info: Drag vehicle modules to and from the sockets to edit the vehicle. Select a module or chassis to repair it.
vehicleediting_nooccupant: No vehicle on the vehicle lift.
vehicleediting_notdriveable: Vehicle needs at least an engine and a driver's seat to leave the garage.
velocitydesc: How much this modification affects the velocity of projectiles fired from the weapon it is attached to
vending.machine.desc:
Trade your goods with other players safely by creating sell and buy orders.  

If a raider gains access to the rear panel, they will have free reign over all of your goodies. Keep it safe.
wall.external.high.desc: Ένα ψηλό ξύλινο τείχος που χρησιμοποιείτε για να κρατήσει έξω τους ανθρώπους από την ιδιοκτησία σας.
wall.external.high.ice.desc: A very high ice wall to protect your property.
wall.external.high.stone.desc: Ένα ψηλό πέτρινο τείχος που χρησιμοποιείτε για να κρατήσει έξω τους ανθρώπους από την ιδιοκτησία σας.
wall.frame.cell.gate.desc: Μια πύλη κελιού φυλακής για να κλειδώσετε πράγματα πίσω από τα κάγκελα
wall.frame.garagedoor.desc: A garage door that rolls up and down.
wall.frame.shopfront.desc: Μια πρόσοψη καταστήματος για να κάνεις εμπόριο.
wall.frame.shopfrontmetal.desc: Μία αλεξίσφαιρη πρόσοψη καταστήματος για ασφαλείς ανταλαγές.
wall.ice.wall.desc: A short wall made of solid ice.
wall.window.bars.metal.desc: Μεταλλικές μπάρες παραθύρου κατασκευασμένες για να ταιριάζουν σε ένα κανονικό μέγεθος παραθύρου.
wall.window.bars.toptier.desc: Μπάρες παραθύρου που ταιριάζουν σε κανονικό παράθυρο. Αυτές οι μπάρες είναι κατασκευασμένες από ενισχυμένο μέταλλο και έχει παχύ πλαίσιο για την προστασία από τα εισερχόμενα βλήματα.
wall.window.bars.wood.desc: Μπάρες παραθύρου φτιαγμένες από ξύλο. Θα αποτρέψουν την διέλευση ατόμων από το παράθυρο, άλλα πιθανό όχι για πολύ καιρό.
wall_desc: Secure your base by enclosing it in walls
wall_frame_desc: A frame that lets you attach various blocks into
watchtower.wood.desc: A high wooden watchtower with a ladder
watchtower.wood.name: Watch Tower
water.barrel.desc: A storage container for water. Can output 10ml of water a second via a hose.
water.catcher.large.desc: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
water.catcher.small.desc: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
water.desc: Νερό. Πίνοντας θα ανακουφίσει τη δίψα σας.
water.purifier.desc: A Water Purifier. Place overtop of a campfire. Will provide clean, drinkable water from salty, or stagnant water.
water.salt.desc: Νερό υψηλής περιεκτικότητας σε αλάτι. Η κατανάλωση του θα βλάψει την υγεία σας.
watercatcher_help: Οι υδροσυλλέκτες συλλέγουν περιοδικά νερό από το περιβάλλον.
waterjug.desc: A large jerry can for water.
waterpump.desc: Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entites.
weapon.mod.flashlight.desc: Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a beam of light. Pressing F (default) to toggle light.
weapon.mod.holosight.desc: Χρησιμοποιεί λέιζερ για να δημιουργήσει θέαμα ολογραφίας που δείχνει πάντα τον στόχο ανεξάρτητα από την οπτική γωνία.
weapon.mod.lasersight.desc: Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a guiding laser and reduces weapon sway.
weapon.mod.muzzleboost.desc: Increases weapon fire rate by channeling gasses back into the weapon cycling it faster, at the cost of bullet velocity and accuracy.
weapon.mod.muzzlebrake.desc: Lowers recoil felt by the operator but can make bullet path more unpredictable and dealing slightly less damage to your foes.
weapon.mod.silencer.desc: Μειώνει σημαντικά τον κρότο των πυροβολισμών, και αφαιρεί πλήρως οποιαδήποτε εμφανή λάμψη.
weapon.mod.simplesight.desc: A poorly made sight, slightly better than iron sights.
window_bars_desc: Αυτές η μπάρες αποτρέπουν την διέλευση ατόμων από το παράθυρο
window_desc: An opening in a wall, perfect for placing windows bars in
winnings_desc: Please ensure you take your winnings before leaving!
wiretool.desc: A tool used to make connections between electrical objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle. you can then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.
wiretool.name: Wire Tool
wolfmeat.burned.desc: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
wolfmeat.cooked.desc: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
wolfmeat.raw.desc: Raw Wolf Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
wolfmeat.spoiled.desc: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
wood.armor.jacket.desc: A shoddy piece of body armor made from Wood and rope.
wood.armor.pants.desc: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from Wood and rope.
wood.desc: Wood. Collected from trees and used in many crafting recipes. It's also needed to cook in camp-fires.
wood.helmet.pants.desc: A shoddy helmet made from Wood and Cloth.
wood.tea.advanced.desc: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.
wood.tea.desc: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.
wood.tea.pure.desc: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.
wood_upgrade_desc: Wood is a medium strength building material but vulnerable to fire
woodcross.desc: A wooden cross marking the remains of an unknown soul
woodcross.name: Wooden Cross
workbench_info: You can use the workbench to experiment using scrap to create a new, previously unknown blueprint.
workbench_resultdesc: The item created from your experiment will appear to the left.
